metadata.subject: Petroleum reserves
Natural gas reserves
Sulfur industry
Oil sands industry
metadata.title: Alberta's energy reserves ... and supply/demand outlook
metadata.creator: Alberta Energy and Utilities Board
metadata.publisher: Calgary : Alberta Energy and Utilities Board
metadata.description: Outlook covers the 10-year period following the date of the report; e.g. Alberta's energy reserves 2005 and supply/demand outlook 2006/2015
Series chronological designation is based on date of publication and is not to be confused with date of report; e.g. series designation for 2005 report is ST98-2006
Issued as text report supplemented with Designated fields (oil and gas) and oil sands areas [map] and Basic reserves data tables [compact disc]
System requirements for online access: Adobe Acrobat
Alberta Government Library*2011 copy 2 is missing map
metadata.notes: No title page found. No copyright page found.
